$ROKU Google Assistant is Smarter Than Alexa and Siri, but Honestly They All Suck  $AMZN $AAPL  
https://gizmodo.com/google-assistant-is-smarter-than-alexa-and-siri-but-ho-1825616612

links.title: Google Assistant is Smarter Than Alexa and Siri, but Honestly They All Suck
links.description: Amazon has managed to make Alexa the brand people think of when it comes to digital voice assistants, but the Google Assistant is the smartest of the bunch according to a new study. Digital marketing agency Stone Temple quizzed the top AI assistants by throwing about 5,000 questions at them to see which was capable of providing the most information.

messages.body: $AAPL Apple is reportedly building an insane ’16K’ VR headset https://techcrunch.com/2018/04/27/apple-is-reportedly-building-an-insane-16k-vr-headset/

links.title: Apple is reportedly building an insane '16K' VR headset
links.description: Apple has long been rumored to be working on a pair of augmented reality glasses, but a report today suggests that they're looking to compete with Google, Microsoft and Facebook in the virtual reality space as well. CNET reports that Apple has its eye set on the 2020 release of a wireless headset that combines AR and VR technologies.

messages.body: $AAPL Apple's rumored AR & VR 'T288' headset may use 8K eyepieces, implement WiGig... https://goo.gl/DsMk9d

links.title: Apple's rumored AR & VR 'T288' headset may use 8K eyepieces, implement WiGig
links.description: Apple's rumored AR headset will be capable of both augmented and virtual reality, and will likely depend on a separate box acting as a "brain" for the device, a report claimed on Friday. The headset -still in its early phases and first discussed in November 2017 -is expected to use 8K displays for each eye, and a processor faster than any Apple currently makes.

messages.body: $AAPL Samsung, Micron, Hynix allegedly conspired to keep DRAM prices high, class actio... https://goo.gl/JdaVkv

links.title: Samsung, Micron, Hynix allegedly conspired to keep DRAM prices high, class action suit filed
links.description: Another class action lawsuit has been filed, alleging that Samsung, Hynix, and Micron conspired to limit the supply of memory, keeping consumer prices artificially high as a result. According to law firm Hagens Berman, competition between between Samsung, Micron and Hynix were forcing prices to drop on RAM, despite record demand for the memory.
